definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: † [[הָֽ֫לְאָה]] (i.e. hā-le’ āh, the final -āh, the [[ה]] locale, being toneless),

definitions.title: adv.
definitions.body: out there, onwards, further (Targum [[הָלָא]], always with [[לְ]] or [[מֵ]] prefixed; Syr. lhal, walhal PS:1009 id.; Ar.hala0 forward! on! F1:Kl. Schr. i. 355)—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of place Ge 19:9 [[גֶּשׁ־הָֽלְאָה]] approach out there! i.e. make way, get back (LXX a(po/sta e(kei): Vulgate recede illuc), Nu 17:2 and the fire [[זְרֵה־הָֽלְאָה]] scatter yonder; [[מֵהָֽלְאָה לְ]] beyond (lit. off the yonder side of; v. [[מִן]]

definitions.title: 4 c
definitions.body: ) Ge 35:21, Je 22:19, Am 5:27 beyond Damascus: [[וׇהָֽלְאָה]] attached to an indication of place, to mark direction, 1Sa 10:3 and thou shalt pass on [[מִשָּׁם וׇהָֽלְאָה]] thence and onwards; 1Sa 20:22 [[מִמְּךָ וׇהָֽלְאָה]] from thee and onwards i.e. beyond thee (opp. to [[מִמְּךָ וׇהֵ֫נָּה]] v:1Sa 20:21), v:1Sa 20:37, Nu 32:19 on the side of Jordan forwards (opp. to ‘on the side of Jordan eastwards’).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of time, Le 22:27 from the 8th day [[וׇהָֽלְאָה]] and onwards, Nu 15:23, 1Sa 18:9 [[מהיום ההוא והלאה]] from that day and onwards, Ez Eze 39:22, Eze 43:27, Is 18:2, Is 18:7. Hence
